Question.Subject: Which is your favourite social networking site and why you like it most?
Question.ChosenAnswer: My popular Social Networking Sites are Orkut And Facebook. Because after using this Sites I found many Old friends by this Sites. Facebook is very Fast than Orkut. It suggests you to Add some of friends which you might be knowing them. Orkut also introduced this Facility this year.

Answer.Content: My favourite is Facebook by far :) I like it because its easy to use... Its set out very good... And Aot of people use it... And i mean ALOT! :) hope i Helped :)
Orkut..because all my friends are there :) :)

My popular Social Networking Sites are Orkut And Facebook. Because after using this Sites I found many Old friends by this Sites. Facebook is very Fast than Orkut. It suggests you to Add some of friends which you might be knowing them. Orkut also introduced this Facility this year.
I like Facebook, because I can play Farmville and Island Paradise and take lots of stupid quizzes.

Answer.Reference: I am a member 6 social networks and Scallyroo is the best (http://www.scallyroo.com)
